label: Hello World
info:
Your first SynthStack workflow - no configuration needed!

This flow demonstrates the basic building blocks:
1. Inject node to trigger the flow
2. Function node to process data
3. Debug node to see the output

Click the button on the Inject node to run it.

name: Format Message
Instructions
info:
## How to use this flow:

1. Click the blue button on the "Click to Start" node
2. Open the Debug panel (bug icon in sidebar)
3. See your formatted message!

## Next steps:
- Try changing the message in the Inject node
- Modify the Function node to add more data
- Add more nodes from the palette
